title: How does a referral program work
body:
### **What is a referral program?**





* `h2 { display: inline }` – [zzzzBov](https://stackoverflow.com/users/497418/zzzzbov "153,334 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:21](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637700_19917922)
* 1

  That's invalid; `h2` is a block element, whilst `a` is inline... – [Tieson T.](https://stackoverflow.com/users/534109/tieson-t "19,614 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:22](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637702_19917922)
* 2

  @TiesonT., no, [the `a` element has a transparent content model, which allows it to contain flow content](http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/text-level-semantics.html#the-a-element) – [zzzzBov](https://stackoverflow.com/users/497418/zzzzbov "153,334 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:23](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637733_19917922)
* @zzzzBov The 4.01 spec says it's inline: [w3.org/TR/html401/struct/links.html#h-12.2](http://www.w3.org/TR/html401/struct/links.html#h-12.2), although the HTML5 spec agrees with your WHATWG link: [dev.w3.org/html5/markup/a.html#a](http://dev.w3.org/html5/markup/a.html#a) - so I suppose it depends on doctype. – [Tieson T.](https://stackoverflow.com/users/534109/tieson-t "19,614 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:28](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637834_19917922)
* 1

  @TiesonT., you should note that this post was tagged with [html5](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/html5) – [zzzzBov](https://stackoverflow.com/users/497418/zzzzbov "153,334 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:29](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637858_19917922)

  `h2 { display: inline }` – [zzzzBov](https://stackoverflow.com/users/497418/zzzzbov "153,334 reputation") [Nov 11 '13 at 23:21](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19917922/how-do-i-put-multiple-links-on-the-same-line-html5/19918024#comment29637700_19917922)
author: Marcos de Juan
